sponsor: Pfizer's Upjohn has merged with Mylan to form Viatris Inc.
briefTitle: Placebo-controlled Safety and Efficacy Study of Pregabalin in Subjects With Post-traumatic Peripheral Neuropathic Pain
officialTitle: A Randomized Double Blind Placebo Controlled Parallel Group Study Of The Efficacy And Safety Of Pregabalin (Bid) In Subjects With Post-traumatic Peripheral Neuropathic Pain
summary: This study is designed to investigate if pregabalin is effective in treating neuropathic (nerve) pain resulting from peripheral nerve trauma due to a traumatic or surgical event such as, for example, motor vehicle accident, fall, sports injury, knee or hip replacement, hernia repair, thoracotomy, mastectomy, focal/localized burns or crush injury.
